position: MSBA’25 @ CMU Tepper | Micron | IIT KGP' 22 | Data Science | Business Analytics | Machine Learning

experience.title: Data Scientist 2
experience.description: • Forecasted wafer characteristics following their traversal through the process chamber using machine learning and regression analysis.• Formulated metrology models that resulted in a decrease in manual monitoring of wafer dimensions• Submitted an internal journal article on ’Preventive and Predictive maintenance on Metrology models’• Worked on analyzing the root-causes for wafer-yield loss and reducing the variability which optimizedthe bad wafer identification process and the cycle-time of the process using statistical analysis anddeep learning techniques
